comments.content: It looks like **[Freight Display Book](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416112445/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Garage-Fonts&ffam=FreightDispBook%20-%20Regular&fid=ee53c6e7b32db1f81cd3bdb80c4b637d&fsize=60&text=American%20Greetings&fit=1)** by Joshua Darden [Garage Fonts, 2005]
